channel.title: 99.99% woodcutting isnt so 99.99% [pi]
channel.description: I wanted to fix my PI woodcutting, because it just was awful, didn't work well at all. So I followed this TUT (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,497636.20.html) and now everything works right, I just don't get logs it just goes through the animation over and over. I was wondering if anyone can help me fix this, or will I have to rise it from the grave to get an answer? I will provide extra information upon request

item.title: 99.99% woodcutting isnt so 99.99% [pi]
item.dc:creator: @thedolphin thedolphin
item.description:
@thedolphin wrote:

Hmm… It didn’t seem to change anything :/. Thank you though. Lemme keep looking.

Read full topic

item.title: 99.99% woodcutting isnt so 99.99% [pi]
item.dc:creator: @DaMatt17 DaMatt17
item.description:
@DaMatt17 wrote:

Replace:

if (c.getItems().addItem(logType,1)) { c.startAnimation(getWcEmote()); logsCutFromTree += 1; c.sendMessage("You get some logs."); c.getPA().addSkillXP(exp * Config.WOODCUTTING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerWoodcutting); c.getPA().refreshSkill(c.playerWoodcutting); c.wcTimer = getWcTimer(density);

with:

if (c.getItems().addItem(logType,1)) { c.startAnimation(getWcEmote()); logsCutFromTree += 1; c.getItems().addItem(logType, 1); c.sendMessage("You get some logs."); c.getPA().addSkillXP(exp * Config.WOODCUTTING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerWoodcutting); c.getPA().refreshSkill(c.playerWoodcutting); c.wcTimer = getWcTimer(density);

Read full topic
